feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.5.4
entry.content:
(SCHEDULES) Redesigned. Add+ disabled until user selects a day. Rids of the double toast notification visual glitch also. (PR INCORPORATION) Idea by @crgodfrey - https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/547

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.5.3...7.5.4

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.5.5
entry.content:
(History) Completely rewrote to get rid of scrolling issues for Huntarr - Now is one scroll-able page

(Logs) Completely rewrote to get rid of scrolling issues for Huntarr - Logs show in reverse order - Logs have pages now and user can set amount - Removed 300 limit warning from search that blocked view - Fixed random json fragment issues - Will work to center page select (will be next update)

(Scheduler) Users can now select all days to make it easier

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.5.4...7.5.5

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.5.6
entry.content:
• Fix some of the logging display issue

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.5.5...7.5.6

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.5.7
entry.content:
• [Huntarr] Rewrite of time handling. Utilizes set user setting for time.
  • [Schedule] Adjust to reflect if user changes time zones
  • [Logs] Adjust to reflect if user changes time zones
  • [Settings] User can set time with state management adjustments
  • [Swappar] Has been REMOVED. Please use Cleanuperr via the info link. Dev is working on a GUI interface soon.

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.5.8
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.5.7...7.5.8

State Management Info is now provided at the end of every app cycle for users to understand and track. If out nothing to process, Huntarr lets them know.
